title: Update Onboarding to include illustrations
body:
# Problem
The current onboarding flow includes .

The illustrations have been designed to bring across the value proposition and playfully explain key concepts of the Status core app; keys, whisper communication, dedicated browser.

## Implementation
Follow Figma design to display 3D images. Specification on dimensions to follow in week of Mon sep 30.

## Acceptance Criteria
Positioning according to spec and smooth rendering of images

## Notes
Related issue, illustration on welcome screen: https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8135

## 
_Illustrations are an example, please wait for specifications._
![afbeelding](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35233054/65706232-4f2d7a80-e08a-11e9-8f6a-0307c34b785d.png)

![Group 4](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35233054/65706411-bba87980-e08a-11e9-8b48-d2bda1685936.png)
cc @rachelhamlin @errorists

All of the assets [can be found here ](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/7k6agwbldlvgbrc/AABPmVgmTwjsB8ZkXLEY98w8a?dl=0)

Already compressed, **don't fiddle with the images pls!**

Issue Status: 1. **Open** 2. Started 3. Submitted 4. Done
__This issue now has a funding of 80.0 DAI (80.0 USD @ $1.0/DAI) attached to it.__ * If you would like to work on this issue you can 'start work' [on the Gitcoin Issue Details page](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/9054/3515). * Want to chip in? Add your own contribution [here](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/9054/3515). * Questions? Checkout Gitcoin Help or the Gitcoin Slack * $146,134.62 more funded OSS Work available on the [Gitcoin Issue Explorer](https://gitcoin.co/explorer)

Issue Status: 1. Open 2. Started 3. Submitted 4. **Done** 

<hr>

__Work has been started__.


These users each claimed they can complete the work by 1 month, 1 week ago.
Please review their action plans below:


**1) [elegant651](https://gitcoin.co/elegant651) has been approved to start work.**

as a frontend-developer, I can deal with this issue. want to contribute this work at first.

Learn more [on the Gitcoin Issue Details page](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/9054/3515).

Heya! Just one more thing that has been lost along the way. The idea of this carousel was that it **moves by itself** to the next item (and then back to the first one when reaches the end) every ~7sec (might change if feels too much/not enough).

Important: the auto-move should stop once the user swipes or even rests their finger on the screen.

Do you think we can fit this little fix in?
Hey @elegant651 would you like to implement #8135 in the scope of this PR, as well? I will pay you both bounties using tip, if you can complete both.

> Hey @elegant651 would you like to implement #8135 in the scope of this PR, as well? I will pay you both bounties using tip, if you can complete both.

Sure, I'll do both of them. should I deal with #8135 first?
Awesome! Up to you @elegant651. You can submit it all in one PR if you like.

Hey @elegant651, update: we actually updated the illustrations in the onboarding issue being worked on by one of our core contributors. So in that case, definitely deal with #8135 first, and #8135 only please 😬

Sorry about that - issues flying left and right! Sometimes we overlap.

> Hey @elegant651, update: we actually updated the illustrations in the onboarding issue being worked on by one of our core contributors. So in that case, definitely deal with #8135 first, and #8135 only please 😬
> 
> Sorry about that - issues flying left and right! Sometimes we overlap.

Got it.
